nodes.text: The Baldur system was a star system that was located within the Nojic sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Slice and the Expansion Region. The system shared its name with conflict known as the Balduran Civil War.
The Baldur system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square P-9.
